name: intgr-lcr.yml
configuration:
spring:
  jpa:
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.Oracle12cDialect
    properties:
      hibernate:
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  datasource:
    url: jdbc:oracle:thin:@//10.31.65.33:1521/lcr10_2
    username: nttm
    password: nttm
    driver-class-name: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver
    hikari:
      maximum-pool-size: 10
      minimum-idle: 0
      idle-timeout: 300000
  jmx:
    default-domain: lcr-app-jmx
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-lcr
  profiles:
    active: ${SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE:local}
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://localhost:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
server:
  port: 8090
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
